creditline: Gift of funds from Dr. Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: tunic-like pullover with short sleeves; dark blue and white resist dyed geometric patterns with squares and triangles; top gathered together to form a rounded headdress decorated with twisted dark blue fiber strands with cowrie shells and squares of red wool; vertical slit/opening for face under headdress; sleeve, hem, and front trim of red wool; cowrie shells trim front and hem
title: Costume
